content:
Is there a way to say on a Q
' you have 2 hrs to complete' so an app can warn, prevent further answers or self-destruct? ( eg, MI on FHIR)
You could do pretty much anything with an extension, but that's certainly not one we've defined so far.
OK I was looking through right now... will make one.. that seems like a common use case has it come up in SDC?
